JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Group Financial Controller for Unifeeder, Aarhus
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to play an important role in a dynamic and fast-growing organization that is characterized by a youthful, international, and professional environment? Are you data-driven, sharp in accounting and have an analytical mindset combined with a strong business acumen? Then you might be Unifeeder's new Group Financial Controller.

betterpeople A/S is on behalf of Unifeeder searching for a Group Financial Controller to the Unifeeder Headquarter.

Career opportunities in a global environment
As a Group Financial Controller at Unifeeder, you will be part of a finance department with great development potential where you will get professional and skilled colleagues who challenge each other to find the best solutions. Unifeeder has an energetic work environment which includes a dynamic approach and a strong team spirit among colleagues in both Aarhus, Singapore, Dubai, and Limassol.

This large international organization values procedures and structure, but as a result of their growth journey they are open to updating, reassessing, and changing the way they do things. At Unifeeder, you will work close to the management in an organization with short decision paths and good development opportunities. They offer you a flexible and versatile work life filled with development, challenge, and inspiration.

Become an important player at Unifeeder
You will become a part of an impactful finance department, where you will be guaranteed committed colleagues around the world. As part of the Group Accounting & Controlling team, you will be a part of building and organizing processes for the annual accounting and taxation timeline, optimizing reporting processes, ensuring transparency and workflows. You will refer directly to Unifeeder's Head of Group Accounting & Controlling.

Your tasks will be wide-ranging and they include accounting management and reporting to the group stakeholders as well as consolidation, reconciliation, follow-up on deviations, and end-of-year closing. Identification and assessment, as well as mapping and follow-up on controls, will also be a part of your work tasks. It is essential that you understand and can assess errors, shortcomings, and risks and it is important that you can manage projects. You will visit foreign subsidiaries to standardize and optimize processes and there will most likely be 5-10 travel days annually.

Structured and data-driven Controller
In order to be successful in this role, you must thrive in a fast-paced work environment, be able to carry out change, and enjoy organizing. We would like you to hold a cand.merc.aud. or a corresponding degree and have a minimum of 2 years of experience in auditing and/or controlling and consolidating.

You have a business-oriented and analytical mindset whilst being experienced in Excel and have proficient IT skills. You master Danish and English written and verbally at a professional level and have experience with IFRS.

Unifeeder
Unifeeder Group is a dynamic logistics company, covering Europe, the Middle East, Asia and the Wider Indian Subcontinent. They operate more than 150 vessels and make the way for +5,2 Mio. containers every year.

Unifeeder simplifies the complex tasks of choosing and managing supply chains by providing efficient and sustainable transport solutions. By expanding the network, coming up with innovative solutions and being agile in day-to-day operations, they enable their customers to concentrate on their core business while Unifeeder makes their cargo flow.

As a key player in global and regional supply chains, they recognize their environmental responsibilities and are committed to contributing to the reduction of local, national & global emissions.

The recruitment is handled by betterpeople A/S
The position is to be filled as soon as possible, and we will be processing applications continuously. However, we are willing to wait for the right candidate. If you have any questions, please contact Sine Fæste at e-mail sfm@betterpeople.dk. All applications are handled confidentially and with discretion. With reference to the GDPR regulations, applications are ONLY received through the link on our website. If you cannot upload your application through this link, please contact us.

PLEASE NOTE: Our job advertisement is automatically and continuously renewed on job portals until the position is filled. A renewal of the job advertisement is not an expression of a reposting, although it may appear so.

(C) betterpeople A/S
